Title: This Secret is Staying With Me! Ep.4
SubTitle: No Translation

Text: Ah, I can't...sustain the magic... At this rate...!
Epsilon loses her focus for an instant.
Mnn...!

Two black, round masses fall in front of Epsilon's
eyes. It was as if they are in slow motion. But...!
No...! Not yet...! I can't let this be found out hereâ€”

The two round lumps that had fallen fill with magic
power and fly through the air with great intensity,
and with a great jiggle return to Epsilon's chest.
At the same time, the dogs attack.
You dogs! Don't! Don't get in my...waaay!
Awoo! *whine, whine*

Perhaps intimidated by Epsilon's screaming, the dogs,
which were about to pounce on her, tuck their tails
and run away in defeat.
Wh-What...?! Hey, come back! My doggiesâ€”

D-Dogs that don't take commands from anyone but me
are scampering away in fear...? Wh-What the hell is
going on?
*pant, pant, pant*...I'm alive...

Hey! What did you do to my dogs?!
What just happened?!
...Nothing happened. Nothing at all.
Epsilon faces the cult member with a ghastly look.

Wh-What's with you...? Speaking of which, two round
lumps fell from your chest onto the ground... Where
did they go?
The cult member takes a step back from Epsilon.
What did you just say?
Huh?
I'm asking you what did you say just now.
Two lumps...
I'll ask you one more time. What did you say?!
Ah, w-well...I didn't say anything...

Good, you didn't say or see anything. Nothing
happened in the first place, anyway...

What...? No...it's not that nothing happened...
If nothing happened, then my very existence
would be meaningless...right? It'd be gone...

I'll repeat. Absolutely! Nothing happened! Zilch!
...Got it?

Epsilon's heavy breathing, sharp eyes, and low voice
that seemed to resonate from the earth is extremely
assertive.
What's your response?

...Y-Yes! Nothing happened! I wasn't experimenting
with artifacts in these ruins! I'm just an ordinary
person who happened to pass by you!
*pant, pant, pant*

(My magic is pretty depleted... but if I focus, I can
still...maintain my suit's shape...)

(Chest, good. Waist, good. Hips, good... I'm willing
to sacrifice a bit of balance at this point, but my
first priority is to maintain shape.)

Epsilon slowly caught her breath. The slime bodysuit,
which had almost lost its shape earlier, had somehow
regained perfect form.
Her breasts jiggle as if to flaunt their presence.

B-But...how are you alive after so much magic was
absorbed?

That squad of three was so weakened that they
couldn't even move their fingers...

I've been through way more hellish experiences than
they have. Do you how much heartbreak I've had?

I'm not the best fighter or the smartest, but I found
a way to live...and I'll never give that up.
But I had a strong enemy as well...â€œnaturalness.â€œ
Huh? What are you talking about...?
Never mind that. Just listen!
...O-Okay.

One day, I began an impossible battle with
â€œnaturalness.â€œ I gave it everything I had.

Yes...repeated battles over shape and softness...I've
been able to fight because of my strong will that
cannot be bested by â€œnaturalness.â€œ

I'm not 100% sure...but apparently, you â€œhaveâ€œ the
mental strength to never break under any
circumstances. That much seems certain.
Huh?! What do you mean â€œhave?!â€œ

I didn't mean that! The way you accentuate your
curves is different! So put that sword down!

*pant, pant* I've absorbed so much magic power that
I've become dazed... Please forgive me if I stab you.
F-Forgive you?! Put that thing away right now!
...I-I know you've been through a bunch of turmoil.

You defeated my dogs, and your mental strength
never seems to fold when you're about to run
out of magic. Why is that?!

Not only have you been through a lot, but you also
have relentless strength that obsesses you...
That's unthinkable for ordinary people...

...Right, you can't even imagine. I have something I
never waver on... My belief.

Belief... Well, there's someone called Shadow in
Shadow Garden.

Your longing and belief in that person is where your
mental strength comes from. That's why you can't
be denied... Is that what you meant...?
You and Shadow are bound so strongly by trust...
Wha...?

A-Am I wrong? Wait, isn't that what we've been
talking about all this time?

O-Of course! When I think of my lord, no matter what
hardship or adversity I may face, I'll never yield to
the Cult of Diablos!

When Epsilon puffed her chest, her blade swung down
mightily and struck the cult member's head.
Aaaghhh!

Ah...I got carried away. Haha...sorry about that.
It just kind of happened, you know.

Huh...? Has the magic reduction ceased? I see...now
that the robe embedded with the artifact has been
sliced in two...I guess that means I'm done here.

I couldn't retrieve the artifact, but it was still in
the experimental stage, and my mission was
to investigate the ruins anyway, right?

I'm great at adapting myself to the situation.
Mission accomplished!

I'm going to check in with my lord. Oops, before I go,
how do I look... Yep, just beautiful as ever!
